title: VSTS Deployment group agent
description: Downloads the latest deployment agent from VSTS and configures it against specified deployment group.

accountUrl.description: The URL for the VSTS account, example https://accountName.visualstudio.com

projectName.description: The VSTS project name, eg MyFirstProject

deploymentGroupName.description: Name of the deployment group against which the agent has to be configured

userName.description: User name with permissions to configure deployment agent

PersonalAccessToken.description: Personal Access Token for accessing VSTS build

deploymentAgentTags.description: Optinally provide comma separated list of tags for deployment agent. Example Web, DB

agentInstallPath.description: Optinally provide agent install path. Defaults to $env:SystemDrive\vstsagent

agentName.description: Optionally provide agent name. Defaults to $env:COMPUTERNAME

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass -File InstallAndConfigureDeploymentGroupAgent.ps1', ' -accountUrl ', parameters('accountUrl'), ' -projectName "', parameters('projectName'), '"', ' -deploymentGroupName "', parameters('deploymentGroupName'), '"', ' -userName ', parameters('userName'), ' -patToken ', parameters('PersonalAccessToken'), ' -deploymentAgentTags "', parameters('deploymentAgentTags'), '"', ' -agentInstallPath "', parameters('agentInstallPath'), '"', ' -agentName "', parameters('agentName'), '"')]
